titleStmt.title: The plaine English-man, his discreet advice, in these distracted times. Wherein the prerogative of the King, the priviledges of the Parliament, and the present proceedings of the Army, according to their just interests are justified. Worthy the perusall of all men. This is licenced and published according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Ley, and are to be sold at his Shop neere Pauls-Chaine,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
